task: Discover a suitable chocolate cupcake recipe on Allrecipes that has a preparation time of under 1 hour and at least 100 user reviews.

observation:
This summary reflects only the latest observations:

The 'Chocolate Cupcakes' recipe on Allrecipes is identified as suitable for the user's criteria. It has a total time of 30 minutes (15 minutes for prep and 15 minutes for cooking) and 1,563 ratings, fulfilling the requirements of having a prep time under 1 hour and at least 100 user reviews. The recipe is described as producing moist and rich cupcakes, easy to make, and popular among the Allrecipes community. Ingredients include flour, cocoa powder, sugar, butter, vanilla, eggs, milk, leavening agents, and salt, with detailed instructions for preparation and decoration.
